alert.note: Alert for Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:09AM CDT until May 07 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River at Oswego affecting Cherokee and Labette Counties. Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County. Neosho River near Chanute affecting Allen and Neosho Counties. Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties. For the Neosho River...including Iola, Chanute, Erie, Parsons, Oswego...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Erie. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, The road 7 miles northwest of Erie at 190th Road just west of Big Creek becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 31.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Neosho River Erie 29.0 31.7 Fri 8 am CDT 29.8 16.8 14.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
